scripts.build-js: browserify -t [babelify --stage 1] js/examples/filter/main.js > public/examples/filter/bundle.js & browserify -t [babelify --stage 1] js/examples/minimal/main.js > public/examples/minimal/bundle.js & browserify -t [babelify --stage 1] js/examples/basic/main.js > public/examples/basic/bundle.js & browserify -t [babelify --stage 1] js/examples/bootstrap/main.js > public/examples/bootstrap/bundle.js
